channel.title: Shotgun fun - Remakeing what GML couldn't [JAVA]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Shotgun Fun - online remake[/size]
We are working on a re-make of a game called Shotgun Fun online, You can download it here: [url=http://sandbox.yoyogames.com/games/156833-shotgun-funfun-online]http://sandbox.yoyogames.com/games/156833-shotgun-funfun-online[/url]
Problems with this game: Is not actually online Made in Game Maker
But we love this game and think we can build a decent remake of it, so here we are, making it!
[b]Things that need doing.[/b]
Game engine Server Map editor Art work
[b]The game engine[/b]
We will be writing our own game engine for this, So we can Customize it to be based around multiplayer. It will be 2D - Side scrolling with basic physics and collision detection. Levels might be based on Davidi2's map editor (Still un-decided) [More coming soon]
[b]The server[/b] There will be 2 servers required: The Lobby server: This will host all client logins and redirects, It will store player data and send out updates.
The Game server: The server the player connects inside the lobby. This is the server he will slaughter zombies in.
[b]Developers[/b]
[b]Programming[/b]
[b]Art[/b] Shrogg gravenfire23
[b]Game design[/b] drubrkletern Shrogg
Please note, that this is *open development*, So anyone can contribute to the project, in any form. like art work, ideas and Code. Our remake will try stay as close to the original game as possible, but we will add our own touch.
If you want to help and contribute, then please say, as any help is welcome.[/center]

item.title: Shotgun fun - Remakeing what GML couldn't [JAVA]
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

I have developed an anti cheat method for offline games, I am to busy to contribute to this project because of my own projects but I’ll be happy to share my anti cheat protocol with you guys.

I can only explain the protocol since I have pretty much 0 knowledge of Java.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:225, topic:408647”][quote author=_s link=topic=509929.msg3712825#msg3712825 date=1313449936]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=509929.msg3712810#msg3712810 date=1313449210]

Read the thread before posting… networking is done, and it’s using my own nio implementation instead of an external library.

your nio implementation probably sucks. gtfo.
[/quote]ur mouth probably sucks gtfo
<3

super_ said it was ok when I asked his opinion on it

src or it doesnt exist
[/quote][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=509929.msg3706843#msg3706843 date=1313093783]
Read the thread before posting…
[/quote];)[/quote]
oh ziplock sent me that the other day

ps i’ll have you know that sifting through shit in this thread isnt on my todo list someone clean this out ty

Read full topic
